"龙湖杭州滨江天街"]

floor_name_ch = ["地下一层", "一层", "二层", "三层", "四层"]

site_name_eng_dict = {}
for name in site_name_ch:
    site_name_eng = translator.translate(name).text
    site_name_eng_dict[name] = site_name_eng

floor_name_eng_dict = {}
for name in floor_name_ch:
    floor_name_eng = translator.translate(name).text
    floor_name_eng_dict[name] = floor_name_eng

site_name_eng_df = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(site_name_eng_dict, orient='index')
site_name_eng_df = site_name_eng_df.reset_index(drop=False)
site_name_eng_df.columns = ["site_name_chinese", "site_name_english"]
site_name_eng_df.to_csv("site_name_eng.csv", index=False)

floor_name_eng_df = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(floor_name_eng_dict, orient='index')
floor_name_eng_df = floor_name_eng_df.reset_index(drop=False)
floor_name_eng_df.columns = ["floor_name_chinese", "floor_name_english"]
floor_name_eng_df.to_csv("floor_name_eng.csv", index=False)

source.2ff2d474: ## Here are the translated Site Names
source.42e76968:
# Translation of Site & Floor Names from Chinese to English

There are 205 sites present in the data for the competition "[Indoor Location & Navigation](https://www.kaggle.com/c/indoor-location-navigation)". The names of the sites are in Chinese. This kernel translates these site names from Chinese to English using `googletrans` library.

Also, there are 5 cases where the floor name is also in chinese. Those have also been translated.

Translated Site & Floor Names are published in the following dataset:

https://www.kaggle.com/arnabbiswas1/indoor-location-navigation-sitename-in-english

Or the CSV file mapping the chinese to english names (`site_name_eng.csv` and `floor_name_eng.csv`) are saved as the output of this kernel.
